price: আৰু নিশ্চয় প্ৰতিদান দিৱসলৈকে তোৰ ওপৰত থাকিল অভিসম্পাত।
arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكَ ٱللَّعۡنَةَ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna ʿalayka al-laʿnata ilā yawmi al-dīni
